name: Steam - Sparkling Levels
description: Important: Click the "Show Css Code" button first. The install button will work after that. I highly recommend this style that makes the "Show Css Code" button much easier to find. ― Another style from yours truly, adding a little bit of fanciness to Steam levels from level 0 to 1000 and beyond. Version: 1.0.1 | View change logs

user.name: Hyokkuda
user.about: I am a hardcore gamer, completionist, creative & perfectionist. I like various anime in the style of Dragon Ball Z, Bleach & Sword Art Online. I love spicy food & vanilla stuff! Also I'm a web stylist. I started off on a community website called Gaia Online with CSS and CSS3 style language. I continued working on websites and designs and now here I am. I am trying to make a living on making websites and web styles like theses. I do not force anyone on donating, but it is most appreciated. ♥

additional_info: This style was created for my personal preferences. There's not much else to say about it. You can find this style embedded already in other styles related to Steam such as Steam Enhancer Plus and Steam Holiday profiles.
